title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From punched cards to AI: The developer’s new mindset (DEV205)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从穿孔卡片到人工智能：开发者的新思维模式 (DEV205)
abstract: Developer evolution is ongoing - from punched cards to cloud-native apps, each wave has reshaped how builders craft. Today, AI introduces a new shift: vibe coding for rapid prototyping, and spec-first development for scalable, maintainable systems. This session takes a step back to explore the broader transformation journey and how developers can confidently navigate the current AI wave. Anda-Catalina will focus on the spec-first mindset and the growing importance of soft skills in human-AI collaboration. A short demo using Kiro illustrates practical strategies and workflows that help developers adapt, communicate, and thrive.
abstract_cn: 开发者的演进持续进行中——从打孔卡到云原生应用，每一次浪潮都重塑了构建者的创造方式。如今，AI引入了新的转变：用于快速原型开发的氛围编码，以及用于可扩展、可维护系统的规范优先开发。本次会议将退后一步，探索更广泛的转型之旅，以及开发者如何自信地驾驭当前的AI浪潮。Anda-Catalina将重点关注规范优先的思维方式，以及软技能在人机协作中日益增长的重要性。使用Kiro的简短演示将展示实用策略和工作流程，帮助开发者适应、沟通并蓬勃发展。
